verses.name: Luke 16:26
verses.text: And beside all this, between us and you there is a great gulf fixed: so that they which would pass from hence to you cannot; neither can they pass to us, that would come from thence.

verses.name: Luke 16:27
verses.text: Then he said, I pray thee therefore, father, that thou wouldest send him to my father’s house:

verses.name: Luke 16:28
verses.text: For I have five brethren; that he may testify unto them, lest they also come into this place of torment.

verses.name: Luke 16:29
verses.text: Abraham saith unto him, They have Moses and the prophets; let them hear them.
